about.subtitle: Welcome to Bolt
about.title: The First Amidst the Rest
about.content1: Bolt Telecommunications Inc. is an established leader in the telecommunications industry. Based in Brampton Ontario, our firm offers fiber optic services.
about.content2: Our highly trained team have the experience and expertise necessary to complete your project on time, within budget and to your specifications.
about.content3: Our vision is to provide you with the best services for your telecommunication needs.

healthAndSafety.subtitle: Health and Safety
healthAndSafety.title: We Are Safety Conscious
healthAndSafety.content1: Bolt Telecommunications Inc. is viewed as a leader in the telecommunication industry and we take every opportunity to enhance our safety and training programs, and ultimately, our safety performance.
healthAndSafety.content2: We are working with industry to pave the road to “ZERO”.
healthAndSafety.content3: Our vision is to provide you with the best services for your telecommunication needs.
healthAndSafety.industryInvolvement: Being an industry leader means you are involved and proactive in providing solutions and sharing ideas with clients and peers.  We pride ourselves on our commitment to engaging with industry and helping shape the future of safety in the energy sector.  Several members of the Bolt team have in the past and continue to have a seat at the table of industry initiatives.
healthAndSafety.safetyInitiatives: Bolt has played a key role in developing training systems to assist industry in meeting the new workplace electrical safety standards. We have also produced safety videos that are shared with industry allowing other companies to utilize these tools in the spirit of creating safer workplaces.

newsletter.title: Let’s find out how to work Together
newsletter.content: Want to know more about Bolt's work around the globe, ground-breaking projects, and other efforts to improve the telecommunications around the world? Sign up for our email brief for hand-picked articles, news, and more.

serviceSectionHeading.subtitle: Major Services
serviceSectionHeading.title: Services We are Offering
serviceSectionHeading.content: We are in the fiber optic splicing business. We major on the implementation of FTTH, MDU, WTTH, FTTB, FTTC, FTTN, and FTTR Networks.

singleService.title: Fiber to the Home (FTTH)
singleService.description: Fiber to the Home (FTTH) is the delivery of a communications signal over optical fiber from the operator's switching equipment all the way to a home, thereby replacing existing copper infrastructure such as telephone wires and coaxial cable.

singleService.title: Fiber to the Building (FTTB)
singleService.description: Fiber to the Building (FTTB) is the delivery of a communications signal over optical fiber from the operator's switching equipment all the way to a building, thereby replacing existing copper infrastructure such as telephone wires and coaxial cable.

singleService.title: Installation & Design Solution
singleService.description: You can count on our installation and design solutions team to take care of all your cabling requirements. All of our solutions in this area are bespoke with your budget and requirement needs in mind. Whether it be Splicing Fiber optic cables, testing, tracing, troubleshooting, and fixing your network problems.  We offer a very cost effective cabling solution with your IT budget in mind, while still maintaining quality and integrity

singleService.title: Multi Dwelling Units (MDU)
singleService.description: Finding the ideal fiber installation solution for Multi Dwelling Units (MDU), normally apartment blocks or hotels, is a major obstacle that carriers face as the pace of Fiber to the Home (FTTH) deployments increases to meet the ever increasing consumer demand for bandwidth, but with BOLT Telecommunications Inc. you can get the best and most seamless solution in terms of cost and delivery time.

singleService.title: Fiber to the Curb (FTTC)
singleService.description: Fiber to the Curb (FTTC) is the delivery of a communications signal over optical fiber from the operator's switching equipment all the way to a curb, thereby replacing existing infrastructure.

singleService.title: Fiber to the Room (FTTR)
singleService.description: Fiber to the Room (FTTR) is the delivery of a communications signal over optical fiber from the operator's switching equipment all the way to a room, thereby replacing existing copper infrastructure such as telephone wires and coaxial cable.

sectionHeading.title: Our Major Clients
sectionHeading.content: Here are some of the major brands that have entrusted their work with us. We have not only delivered the best for them, but also turn out to be their first choice.

clientsDetails.name: Telecon
clientsDetails.details: Telecon is Canada's leading provider of telecommunications network infrastructure services.

clientsDetails.name: Machtech
clientsDetails.details: Machtech is a multidisciplinary company in the telecommunications industry and a proud partner of reputable commercial,  local and national customers.

clientsDetails.name: VistaCare Communications
clientsDetails.details: VistaCare Communications was established in greater to solve technology challenges for today's business and organizations. Today, they deliver digital communication.

clientsDetails.name: Rogers
clientsDetails.details: Rogers Communications Inc. is a Canadian communications and media company operating primarily in the fields of wireless communications, cable television, telephony and Internet.

clientsDetails.name: Expertech
clientsDetails.details: Expertech Network Installation is a major network infrastructure service provider for the wireline and wireless broadband technology market and employs over 1,200 experts.

clientsDetails.name: Cogeco
clientsDetails.details: Cogeco provides superfast fibre-powered Internet, flexible TV and Residential Home Phone services.

clientsDetails.name: Bell
clientsDetails.details: Bell is Canada's largest telecommunications company, providing Mobile phone, TV, high speed and wireless Internet, and residential Home phone services.

sectionHeading.subtitle: We handle your privacy issues in the best of manner
sectionHeading.title: Privacy Policy
sectionHeading.content: Kindly go through the privacy details on this page to understand how we handle your privacy data and issues.

section1.header: What Are Our Privacy Policies for?
section1.paragraph1: Bolt Telecommunications Inc. ('Bolt', 'we', 'us', 'our') values your personal data and are committed to protecting your privacy whenever you interact with us. Please read the applicable Privacy Policy, to understand our policies, processes and procedures regarding the processing of your personal data.
section1.paragraph2: By these Policies, we explain how your personal data is collected, used, managed and transferred by Bolt, and how you can update your personal data with us and exercise your rights in respect of the personal data provided to us.

section2.header: The Personal Data that We collect
section2.paragraph1: We collect the personal data that you provide us with, for example, by filling in an online form, registering your details or applying for a job through our website.
section2.paragraph2: We may also automatically collect some technical information when you visit our website such as your IP address, and information about your visit, such as the pages that you viewed. This information helps us understand visitor interests and helps us improve our website. When you visit our website, the pages that you look at, and a short text file called a cookie, are downloaded to your computer. By visiting and using our website, you agree to our use of cookies in line with Bolt’s policies.

section3.header: What Purpose Do We Use Your Personal Data for?
section3.paragraph1: We may process your personal data to communicate with you, provide you with further information about our service solutions and how we can serve you better, respond to your requests, process your application for employment with Bolt or to fulfil our contractual obligations with you.  We may also process your personal data to comply with provisions of applicable laws.

section4.header: Who do we share your Personal Data with?
section4.paragraph1: We respect your privacy and we limit disclosure of your personal data to third parties. We do not sell, give or trade any personal data that we obtain from you to any third party for data-mining or marketing purposes. However, we may share your personal data with companies within Bolt or third parties such as service providers engaged by us to provide services to Bolt subject to appropriate data security and protection. We may also share your information where there is a regulatory or statutory obligation to disclose such personal data in accordance with provisions of applicable laws.

section5.header: Security And Retention of Your Personal Data
section5.paragraph1: Your personal data is kept private and we make every effort to ensure it is secure, including restricting access to personal data held with us on a need to know basis. We require our staff and any third parties who carry out any work on our behalf to comply with appropriate security standards to protect personal data.
section5.paragraph2: We take appropriate measures to ensure that your personal data is only processed for the minimum period necessary in line with the purposes set out in this Notice or as required by applicable laws, until a time it is no longer required or has no use. Once your personal data is no longer required, we destroy it in a safe and secure manner.

section6.paragraph1: Where processing of personal data is based on consent, we shall obtain the requisite consent at the time of collection of the data. In this regard, you consent to the processing of your personal data when you access our platforms, or use our services, content, features, technologies or functions offered on our website or other digital platforms.

section7.paragraph1: Bolt collects personal data only for the purposes identified in this Notice and such information cannot be reused for another purpose that is incompatible with the original purpose.

paragraph2.introduction: You can exercise the following rights with respect to your personal data with Bolt:
list: Request for and access your personal data collected and stored by Bolt;
Request rectification and modification of personal data kept by Bolt;
Request for deletion of your personal data;
Be informed of and entitled to provide consent prior to the processing of personal data for purposes other than that for which the personal data were collected;
Request that Bolt restricts processing of your personal data; and
Request for information regarding any specific processing of your personal data.
paragraph2.conclusion: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the Regulator regarding any issue relating to the processing of your personal data.

section8.paragraph1: Due to constant changes in technology and regulatory requirements, we may need to change or update our privacy notices from time to time. You will always be able to find the most recent version of our updated Privacy Notices on this site.

section9.paragraph1: If you would like further information on either Notice, please contact contacts@bolttelecommunications.com
